text:
Only if your landing page is set to password protected/membership protected.

Most folks would not membership protect a landing page since that’s typically something you would do to engage prospects. That said, there are some use-cases where it may be useful to membership/password protect a landing page. (like having an offer only available to a small group of people.)
In-case anyone stumbles on this message. Thread here: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CMXUWUY5D/p1641794195005200>
is there a way to add a version number to a theme.json file?

We’ll butter my biscuit and call me “stew”!
You’re correct, <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes#theme-json|it’s that easy> lol
